review: Just what I was hoping for.  Nearly turned our TV into a smart TV.  Highly recommend this to anyone that has Amazon Prime.  It can be somewhat difficult to browse for movies but there is a search option that can be utilized for searching by Title, Actor, Genre etc.  Flexibility to easily move this from one TV to another is nice as well.  Great addition to get even more out of my Prime account.
author: Andrew McLallen

review: This is my second one and my third is on the way....love it, love it, love it. Easy set up and now I have more choices...Getting rid of the high priced cable package...basic is all I need now.
